ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game
Class GameStatus

java.lang.Object
  ch.hszt.connectfour.model.game.GameStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serial
public class GameStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serial

Encapsulates and provides relevant information about the current status of a game.

Version:
1.0, 13.10.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch

getWinnerSlots

public java.util.List<GameBoardSlot> getWinnerSlots()
Returns the game winning List of GameBoardSlot.

Returns:
The game winning GameBoardSlot instances or NULL, if neither player has "ConnectFour". The latter can be evaluated by checking isConnectFour() value.

isConnectFour

public boolean isConnectFour()
Determines, if there is a connect four situation in associated Game

Returns:
true, if there is a connect four situation; otherwise false.

getWinner

public Player getWinner()
Returns the winning Player if a connect four situation is given.

Returns:
The winning Player or null, if no winner determined yet, i.e. no connect four situation is given. The latter can be evaluated by checking isConnectFour() value.
